resource_section: Tourists arrivals by country of residence and month (All Countries) 2020
remarks: Dataset contains tourist arrival statistics by month and country for 2020, showing monthly arrivals for 188 countries. Columns: Country and 12 months (January through December). Data shows arrivals primarily in the first three months (January-March) with most countries having zero arrivals from April onwards, reflecting the impact of COVID-19 travel restrictions.
